predicate.note: Frames file for 'beam' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: He gives pep talks in periodic `` family briefings '' beamed [*] internationally on `` FXTV , '' the company 's own television network .
example.arg: on `` FXTV , '' the company 's own television network

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` We 've had the Russians and Chinese , and people from India visiting us , '' Mr. Iverson beams [*T*-1] .
example.arg: [*T*-1] -> We 've had the Russians and Chinese , and people from India visiting us
